entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Failed to execute 'insertBefore' on 'Node': Nodes of type '#text' may not be inserted inside nodes of type '#document' #48574
  • RequireLocalPort and related extensions for IEndpointConventionBuilder #48571
  • Blazor Hybrid should support the new RenderMode attribute #48568
    Backlog
  • API Proposal ComponentState.LogicalParentComponentState #48557
    8.0-preview6
  • `UserManager.AddClaimAsync` keeps throwing duplicate PK exception for new claims #48556

Closed

  • .net 6 WebAPI Template requires program.cs restructuring to add a Log Provider class #48575

PullRequests

Created

  • Reslove JsonTypeInfo<T> once per request body parameter #48573
    area-runtime
  • Expose SNI hostname in ITlsHandshakeFeature #48572
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [Blazor] SupplyFromFormParameter support nested complex object bindings #48570
    area-blazor
  • [Blazor] SupplyParameterFromForm complex type support. #48567
    area-blazor
  • add review comment to sb files #48566
    area-infrastructure
  • [Blazor] SupplyParameterFromForm dictionary support #48565
    area-blazor
  • [release/7.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `d5cae28` to `68cd408` #48564
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `797b0ad` to `04cf298` #48563
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `042dd9c` to `1d1834b` #48562
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `797b0ad` to `04cf298` #48561
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [Blazor] SupplyParameterFromForm primitive collections #48559
    area-blazor

Updated

  • [Blazor] Support for primitive types in [SupplyParameterFromForm] #48432
    area-blazor
  • Sections with other features #48518
    area-blazor
  • Update RDG to use interceptors feature #48555
    feature-rdg, area-minimal
  • [Blazor] Take cascading parameter attribute type into account when supplying cascading values #48554
    area-blazor
  • Do not emit unused fields in RDG source #48426
    community-contribution, feature-rdg, area-minimal
  • Pass through arbitrary attributes to QuickGrid #48268
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • explicitly identifying button type in QuickGrid columnbase #48277
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • [Blazor] Source generator to create the discovery information at compile time. #48284
    area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun
